price: 146. Waxaana u soo bixinnay geed Aredube ah17.
footnotes: 17. Maadaamana Nabi Yuunus xeebta lagu soo tuuray isagoo aan dub lahayn. Wuxuu Alle u soo saaaray geedkaasi bocorka (aredube, ubo) si uu u harsiiyo oo uga ilaaliyo cayaayin wax yeela.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
